alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson Davis, southeastern Beauregard, northeastern Calcasieu and southwestern Allen Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buller, or 8 miles west of Fenton, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Iowa, Kinder, Fenton, Reeves, Moss Bluff, Ragley, Longville, Buller, Harmony, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Leblanc and Lacassine. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 37 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
